授業目的: This course will take you to a journey through Europe. Together, we will look at some of the most interesting social, political and economic issues faced by EU member states. We will analyse labour mobility to the UK, refugees in Germany, rural decline in Romania, Greece's structural problems, youth unemployment and the Mamma boys in Italy, among others.
到達目標:
This course aims at providing a better understanding of the current situation of EU countries and what makes them special.

Students will improve the following skills: discussion skills, critical thinking, analytical skills, presentation skills and academic writing skills.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: The course will be conducted as a seminar, and active student participation is expected.
